text: Milyonêr (English translation: Millionaire) is a Kurdish game show based on the original British format of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?. The show is hosted by Shuan Haco. The main goal of the game is to win 100 million dinars by answering 15 multiple-choice questions correctly. There are three lifelines - fifty fifty, phone a friend and ask the audience. Milyonêr was broadcast from 2009 to 2011. It is shown on the Kurdistani TV station Kanal4. When a contestant gets the third question correct, he will leave with at least 25,000 dinars. When a contestant gets the sixth question correct, he will leave with at least 250,000 dinars. When a contestant gets the ninth question correct, he will leave with at least 3,000,000 dinars. When a contestant gets the twelfth question correct, he will with at least 15,000,000 dinars. Later the guaranteed sum was changed, now they was appeared on question 5 and 10. == The game's prizes == :* 1. question • 5,000 dinars :* 2. question • 10,000 dinars :* 3. question • 25,000 dinars (guaranteed sum) :* 4. question • 50,000 dinars :* 5. question • 100,000 dinars :* 6. question • 250,000 dinars (guaranteed sum) :* 7. question • 750,000 dinars :* 8. question • 1,500,000 dinars :* 9. question • 3,000,000 dinars (guaranteed sum) :* 10. question • 6,000,000 dinars :* 11. question • 9,000,000 dinars :* 12. question • 15,000,000 dinars (guaranteed sum) :* 13. question • 30,000,000 dinars :* 14. question • 50,000,000 dinars :* 15. question • 100,000,000 dinars Category:Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? Category:Iraqi television shows Category:2010 television series debuts
title: Miliyoner
